title: We Restocked Our Yucca Socks
content:
Our in-demand pinecone-colored wool Yucca Socks have been restocked in our webshop. We’ve fielded a lot of requests for these and our Sillycybin designs (more of those on the way in two weeks) and we’re pleased to announce they are back in stock in our webshop today.

Head on over to the Radavist Webshop to score a pair…
author: prolly
